title: Client not launching
body: Just downloaded the current patch and when i hit the launch button nothing happens. When i try to re open i get a error box saying its already running and would i like to close it to open a new one and if i hit yes still nothing.

replies.body: The login screen not appearing after launch may be due to a corrupt patcher and not necessarily your client.  We have a [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide that may help to resolve this for you.  Please let us know if you have any questions!
Thanks, for the replies. I used the hextech repair and forced reinstalled the patch and it cleared up all the issues.

The client itself could be corrupted you might have to reinstall it, if you do install League make sure you do it as an admin to prevent it from happening again.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Try running the game as an admin, or using the **lol.launcher.admin** to start it.
